ca.ualberta.lard.Stretchy

Class SearchRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.lard.Stretchy.SearchRequest

  • public class SearchRequest
extends Object
    Elastic search uses specific string literal formatting. SearchRequest transforms the size, body text, and parent of a comment into the correct Json String format.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SearchRequest(CommentRequest req) 
      SearchRequest(int size)

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean anyQuery()
      Helper function for toString().
      String bodyString()
      This is a helper function for toString() that turns the body text into a String literal for elastic search.
      void bodyText(String text) 
      void parent(String id) 
      String toString()
      Turns information about the size, body text, and the parent of a comment into a Json String literal that is usable in elastic search.

      • anyQuery

        public boolean anyQuery()
        Helper function for toString(). This is used if we want to search for bodytext or parent specifically.
        Returns:
        true if either bodyText or parent is set

      • bodyString

        public String bodyString()
        This is a helper function for toString() that turns the body text into a String literal for elastic search.
        Returns:
        the body text in the form of a string literal
